Format.ReportTitle: Trabajos de grado por programa curricular
Format.ReportDescription: Muestra una relaci√≥n entre los docentes y su aporte como director, revisor y jurado. Para un proyecto curricular.

SQL.SQLRaw:
SELECT row_number() over () as num, docente, COALESCE(director,0) AS director, COALESCE(revisor,0) AS revisor, COALESCE(jurado,0) AS jurado FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN d.docente IS NULL THEN (CASE WHEN r.docente IS NULL THEN j.docente ELSE r.docente END) ELSE d.docente END AS docente, CASE WHEN director IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE director END AS director, CASE WHEN revisor IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE revisor END AS revisor, CASE WHEN jurado IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE jurado END AS jurado FROM ( SELECT docente, SUM(director) AS director FROM ( SELECT nombre || ' ' || apellido AS docente, count(antp_antp) AS director FROM polux_usuario JOIN trabajosdegrado.ge_tprof ON id_usuario=prof_us JOIN trabajosdegrado.ant_tantp ON prof_prof=antp_dir_int WHERE antp_eantp<>'NO APROBADO' AND antp_eantp<>'CANCELADO' AND antp_eantp<>'FINALIZADO' AND antp_eantp<>'PROYECTO' GROUP BY id_usuario
UNION
SELECT nombre || ' ' || apellido AS docente, count(proy_proy) AS director FROM polux_usuario JOIN trabajosdegrado.ge_tprof ON id_usuario=prof_us JOIN trabajosdegrado.pry_tproy ON prof_prof=proy_dir_int WHERE 1=1 [AND prof_pcur IN ({proyecto})] AND proy_eproy<>'REPROBADO' AND proy_eproy<>'CANCELADO' AND proy_eproy<>'FINALIZADO' AND proy_eproy<>'INFORME FINAL' GROUP BY id_usuario
UNION
SELECT nombre || ' ' || apellido AS docente, count(info_info) AS director FROM polux_usuario JOIN trabajosdegrado.ge_tprof ON id_usuario=prof_us JOIN trabajosdegrado.inf_tinfo ON prof_prof=info_dir_int WHERE 1=1 [AND info_pcur IN ({proyecto})] AND info_einfo<>'CANCELADO' GROUP BY id_usuario ) AS total GROUP BY docente ORDER BY docente ) d
FULL JOIN
( SELECT nombre || ' ' || apellido AS docente, COUNT(rev_antp) AS revisor FROM trabajosdegrado.ge_tprof JOIN polux_usuario ON prof_us=id_usuario JOIN trabajosdegrado.ant_trev ON prof_prof=rev_prof JOIN trabajosdegrado.ant_tacantp ON rev_antp=acantp_antp JOIN trabajosdegrado.ant_tantp ON rev_antp=antp_antp WHERE 1=1 [AND antp_pcur IN ({proyecto})] AND antp_eantp<>'NO APROBADO' AND antp_eantp<>'CANCELADO' AND antp_eantp<>'FINALIZADO' AND antp_eantp<>'PROYECTO' GROUP BY docente ORDER BY docente ) r ON d.docente=r.docente
FULL JOIN
( SELECT nombre || ' ' || apellido AS docente, COUNT(sljur_prof_asignado) AS jurado FROM trabajosdegrado.ge_tprof JOIN polux_usuario ON prof_us=id_usuario JOIN trabajosdegrado.inf_tsljur ON prof_prof=sljur_prof_asignado JOIN trabajosdegrado.inf_tacinfo ON sljur_info=acinfo_info JOIN trabajosdegrado.inf_tinfo ON acinfo_info=info_info WHERE 1=1 [AND info_pcur IN ({proyecto})] AND info_einfo<>'CANCELADO' AND info_einfo<>'FINALIZADO' GROUP BY docente ORDER BY docente) j ON d.docente=j.docente ) AS total ORDER BY docente

PageHeader.HeaderText: {REPORT_TITLE}{STYLE border-width: 1 0 1 0; margin: 15px 0px 0px 0px; border-color: #000000; font-size: 18; border-style: solid;padding:5px 0px 5px 0px; height:1cm; background-color: #000000; color: #ffffff; text-align: center}
Time: date('Y-m-d H:i:s'){STYLE font-size: 10; text-align: right; font-style: italic;}
